item.title: Eye
item.description: An image made by mixing digital drawing and photo manipulation. Inspired by works of Howard Philips Lovecraft.

item.title: In the mountains of madness
item.description: Digital painting and photo manipulation. Work inspired by the novel of Howard Philips Lovecraft - At the Mountains of Madness.
